# UriExtensions class

Static class than contains extension methods for a Uri references.

```csharp
public static class UriExtensions
```

## Public Members

| name | description |
| --- | --- |
| static [IsAccessible](UriExtensions/IsAccessible.md)(…) | Gets or sets a value indicating whether the specified Uri is accessible synchronously. |
| static [IsAccessibleAsync](UriExtensions/IsAccessibleAsync.md)(…) | Gets or sets a value indicating whether the specified Uri is accessible asynchronously. |
